about_the_game:
Story Plot: At the start of the story, you're living with your girlfriend, Nina. Both you and Nina are working as instructors in a yoga center. One day, she asks you to let a guy work there with you and her. Your mother also asks you to let her boyfriend stay with you. You can refuse to let them join the story (Harem & Netori Route). If you allow them to appear in the story, you'll have to try to keep the women for yourself. In this choice, you can decide whether to share your girlfriend with them (Netorase Route) or not. But if you fail to keep them for you, you'll be living in hell (Netorare Route)! Besides, you can also decide to swap couples with your new neighbors or not. Your choices will take you to different endings.

Summer of Love is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare & Netorase), what you need to do is refusing to let Kayne (Nina's friend) and Joe (your mother's boyfriend) join the story.
  • If you want a thrilling feeling, you can let the guys join the story but stop them any time they try to seduce the women.
  • If you let them join the story but fail to stop them, you'll be living in hell!

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains a lot of sexual scenes. There are many routes. You can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.

detailed_description:
Story Plot: At the start of the story, you're living with your girlfriend, Nina. Both you and Nina are working as instructors in a yoga center. One day, she asks you to let a guy work there with you and her. Your mother also asks you to let her boyfriend stay with you. You can refuse to let them join the story (Harem & Netori Route). If you allow them to appear in the story, you'll have to try to keep the women for yourself. In this choice, you can decide whether to share your girlfriend with them (Netorase Route) or not. But if you fail to keep them for you, you'll be living in hell (Netorare Route)! Besides, you can also decide to swap couples with your new neighbors or not. Your choices will take you to different endings.

Summer of Love is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare & Netorase), what you need to do is refusing to let Kayne (Nina's friend) and Joe (your mother's boyfriend) join the story.
  • If you want a thrilling feeling, you can let the guys join the story but stop them any time they try to seduce the women.
  • If you let them join the story but fail to stop them, you'll be living in hell!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Summer of Love (Captain Kitty) - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In Summer of Love, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.
